segments.text: The little girl looks so hopeful, waiting for her brother to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hand is outstretched, and she’s watching him carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s trying not to make any noise so the woman won’t notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her eyes are wide with excitement, like she can’t wait to get that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s standing close to the stool, ready to catch anything he drops.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet she’s been waiting for this moment all day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really struggling to balance, but she doesn’t seem worried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they both get what they want without getting caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is kind of sweet, even if it’s a little risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how determined she looks.
segments.speaker: PAR
